meanings.definition: A person who lives on an island.
meanings.sent1: The islanders fish in the clear blue waters.
meanings.sent2: The islanders enjoy the tropical weather all year round.
meanings.sent3: The islanders had a picnic on the sandy beach.
meanings.sent4: The islanders are like stars in the vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The islanders gather around the bonfire for storytelling.

meanings.sent1: The islanders rely on fishing for their livelihood.
meanings.sent2: The islanders welcome tourists with warm hospitality.
meanings.sent3: The islanders organized a fun treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The islanders are the heartbeat of the island community.
meanings.sent5: The islanders celebrate the annual festival with joy.
